Christmas Turkey

Description

The best way to celebrate the Dungeonmas, is to eat a piece of baked turkey. In order to celebrate the day when monsters invaded the dungeon. Which in the end, attracted an incredible amount of tourists and travelers from all around the world, improving the economic situation in the region.

Stats

  • Type: Food
  • Nutrition: Full satiation (Hunger.STARVING level = 320 energy points)
  • Price: 30 gold per item
  • Weight: 5
  • Image: 11 from items/food.png sprite sheet

Special Properties

  • Satiation: Completely fills hunger bar (Hunger.STARVING level)
  • Holiday Theme: Seasonal festive food item
  • Satiating: Provides full nutrition restoration

Acquisition

  • Found in Treasury chests (10% chance) - see Town and Spider levels
  • Found in Spider-themed Treasury chests (10% chance)
  • Available in Town shop Treasury (5% chance)

Usage

Christmas Turkey is a special holiday-themed food item that provides full satiation, making it excellent for long dungeon expeditions. It's a rare festive treat with a humorous backstory about “Dungeonmas”.

Content Verification

  • Information source: Java Class com.nyrds.pixeldungeon.items.food.ChristmasTurkey
  • Stats verification: energy = Hunger.STARVING (320 points), price = 30 * quantity
  • Effect descriptions source: Code analysis and string resources
  • Last updated: Based on Remixed Dungeon source code
  • Source code: ChristmasTurkey.java
